paper_abstract: The goal of climate informatics, an emerging discipline, is to inspire collaboration between climate scientists and data scientists, in order to develop tools to analyze complex and ever-growing amounts of observed and simulated climate data, and thereby bridge the gap between data and understanding. Here, recent climate informatics work is discussed, along with some of the field's remaining challenges.
paper_title: Climate Informatics: Accelerating Discovering in Climate Science with Machine Learning
